title: spectate afk

replies.body:
i think i've been hacked
is there anything to do?

ok thanks
on a same note, is there anyway possible to report a hack? i think i've been hacked and it scares me quite a bit :/
Don't worry, you will not be counted as AFK/leaver for leaving spectating or Custom games, even though you get that confirmation notice.
That is correct.  You get this notice simply because of how the Leaverbuster system is coded into the client and our systems.  If you are just spectating, no penalties will happen to you :)
